item.title: WebSockets in FastAPI: From Basics to Scaling
item.description: WebSockets enable real-time, bidirectional communication, perfect for chat apps, live notifications, and gaming. FastAPI, a modern Python framework, makes it easy to implement WebSockets for scalable, real-time applications. This blog walks you through setting up WebSocket connections, handling messages, and managing client-server interactions in FastAPI, with practical examples and best practices.
